desc: Limited edition screen-printed originals including t-shirts, poster prints, greeting cards and other curiosities. All our products are infused with an offbeat, idiosyncratic humour intended to comfort and insulate against the cruelties of modern life. We hope it works.

layout.text:
We have returned after an enforced hiatus so thanks for hanging on in there.
To celebrate our return we have a number of new designs and products to tickle your humour bones and console you in this time of despair and all-consuming dread.
We also plan to run a stall at Green Man Festival this August so if you've got a ticket we'll see you there!
